AnnihilatorTank.name: Annihilator Tank
AnnihilatorTank.description: The mammoth Annihilator packs a big punch and knows how to take a beating.

Warmachine.name: Warmachine
Warmachine.description: The Warmachine is the cornerstone of your army.

JammerTruck.name: Jammer Truck
JammerTruck.description: The Jammer is effective at neutralizing cloak bonuses and air raids.

Blockade.name: Blockade
Blockade.description: Blockades get in the way of stuff.

LancerTank.name: Lancer Tank
LancerTank.description: Lancer attacks will hit any unit behind the one you targetted.

SpiderTank.name: Spider Tank
SpiderTank.description: The Spider Tank stuns its target to avoid counter attack.

HeavyCommando.name: Heavy Commando
HeavyCommando.description: Heavies like to engage tanks and capture properties.

StrikeCommando.name: Strike Commando
StrikeCommando.description: Enemy Commandos and Trucks fear the property-capturing Strike Commando.

FlakTank.name: Flak Tank
FlakTank.description: The Flak Tank's cannon shreds aircraft and lightly armored units to pieces.

ScorpionTank.name: Scorpion Tank
ScorpionTank.description: The versatile Scorpion Tank is the back bone of most armed forces.

MortarTruck.name: Mortar Truck
MortarTruck.description: The Mortar Truck is a general purpose cost-effective medium range artillery unit.

RocketTruck.name: Rocket Truck
RocketTruck.description: Specialized long range unit that can fire on enemy aircraft and tanks.

Turret.name: Turret
Turret.description: This immobile defensive unit helps deter both ground, sea and air invasions.

StealthTank.name: Stealth Tank
StealthTank.description: Stealth attack bonuses make this a powerful weapon in the hands of a capable general.

AlbatrossTransport.name: Albatross Transport
AlbatrossTransport.description: The Albatross is the fastest way to move Commandos around the map.

RaptorFighter.name: Raptor Fighter
RaptorFighter.description: Effective at engaging air, sea and ground targets.

VultureDrone.name: Vulture Drone
VultureDrone.description: A specialized scavenger that can move and attack again, if it kills its target.

CondorBomber.name: Condor Bomber
CondorBomber.description: The Condor Bomber is as hardy as it is powerful. It fears only the enemy Raptor.

LeviathanBarge.name: Leviathan Barge
LeviathanBarge.description: Leviathans transport ground units across the oceans.

HunterSupport.name: Hunter Support
HunterSupport.description: Hunters excel at keeping the oceans clear of enemy aircraft and U-boats.

CorvetteFighter.name: Corvette Fighter
CorvetteFighter.description: The Corvette is the brawler of the seas, capable of engaging most enemy targets effectively.

U-Boat.name: U-Boat
U-Boat.description: The U-boat's cloak is useful for holding choke points and attacking an entrenched foe.

Battlecruiser.name: Battlecruiser
Battlecruiser.description: The massive guns of the Battlecruiser can fire further than all other units.

Intrepid.name: Intrepid
Intrepid.description: Use the Intrepid to capture sea properties and warfactories along coast lines.
